name: Free Wi-Fi
description: Stay connected with high-speed internet throughout the resort.

name: Swimming Pool
description: An infinity pool with stunning ocean views.

name: Spa
description: A full-service spa offering massages and beauty treatments.

name: Free Breakfast
description: Start your day with a delicious continental breakfast.

name: Hot Tub
description: Relax and unwind in the outdoor hot tub.

name: Sauna
description: Recharge in the sauna after a day of outdoor activities.

name: Fitness Center
description: A fully equipped fitness center to keep you active during your stay.

name: 24/7 Concierge
description: Our concierge service is available around the clock to assist with your needs.

name: Restaurant
description: Enjoy gourmet meals at our on-site restaurant with a city view.

name: Private Beach
description: Exclusive access to the resort's private beach.

name: Water Sports
description: Enjoy a variety of water sports including jet skiing, snorkeling, and diving.

name: Room Service
description: 24/7 room service available for your convenience.

name: Rooftop Bar
description: Sip cocktails while enjoying the stunning view of Tokyo's skyline.

name: Private Pool
description: Each villa has a private pool with a view of the desert.

name: Air Conditioning
description: Maintain the perfect room temperature with air conditioning.
